name: Garlic-Sesame Purple Sprouting Broccoli
author: barbara
summary: This was my first time cooking purple sprouting broccoli (it came in my CSA box) and it turned out delicious. You can eat the entire vegetable, I just trimmed the ends of the thicker stalks and some of the leaves that were a bit wilted. Great healthy spring vegetable!
ingredients: 2 teaspoons toasted sesame seeds, or to taste
directions: Bring a large wide pot of salted water to a boil
Drop in broccoli and boil until dark green, 3 to 4 minutes
Heat vegetable and sesame oils in a large skillet over medium-low heat
Add garlic and cook, stirring frequently, until fragrant and light brown, 2 to 3 minutes
Add broccoli and stir-fry until well seasoned with garlic oil, 2 to 3 minutes
